titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for the reimbursement of expenses incurred by a Federal employee in the adoption of a child.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1061)

bill.summary: 4/28/1993--Introduced. Requires the head of each Federal agency (including the U.S. Postal Service) to establish a program under which agency employees shall, under certain circumstances, be reimbursed for expenses incurred in the adoption of a child. Prohibits the denial of a reimbursement from being based on the applicant's marital status.
